class_notes: (Class will meet once per week on Tuesday at 4:20 PM to 5:35 PM, plus additional asynchronous content.)
course_description: This course explores the nature of music and why it matters. Themes include: music and emotion; the politics of music; improvisation and freedom; musical communication; music and meaning. Various genres will be engaged such as ambient, blues, classical, EDM, jazz, rap, and world music.
sections: Class Nbr: 3395, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 4:20-5:35p, Instructor: C. Willett, Status: Open
